file.title: Message invalid

p.text: When the user is trying to activate a program and the registration key is invalid, the massage specified in this property is displayed to the user.

remarks.text: If it is necessary to input quotes in this message, then you should double them in the text:
remarks.codesnip: "There a text is without quotes and ""there is in quotes""."

p.text: To insert Newline (equal to pressing of Enter key) use Quick fill words -> Others or input a symbol "¶"

file.seealso:
Message valid
Key validation
Other of the object
